asteroid.utils

Class CheckUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • asteroid.utils.CheckUtils

  • public class CheckUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility functions to add checks to MethodNode. Checks are a very basic help to code in a contract way in your code very much like other frameworks do like Spock

    Imagine you had a class with a method like: 
    
 void myOperation(Integer number) {
    check: 'number is greater than 5'
    number > 5

    then: 'print that number plus one'
    println number + 1
 }
    If you have targeted that method using addCheckTo(org.codehaus.groovy.ast.MethodNode) the expected behavior when calling myOperation(4) is the code to fail using the text in the statement label.

    Checks are used in Asteroid local transformations by default
    Since:
    0.1.5
    See Also:
    Utils
